greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of primitive (aperiodic) palindromic structures using a maximum of three different symbols.
comment: Permuting the symbols will not change the structure.
reference: M. R. Nester (1999). Mathematical investigations of some plant interaction designs. PhD Thesis. University of Queensland, Brisbane, Australia. [See A056391 for pdf file of Chap. 2]
link: Andrew Howroyd, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..500
formula: a(n) = Sum_{k=1..3} A284826(n, k) for n > 0. - _Andrew Howroyd_, Oct 02 2019
results.author: _Marks R. Nester_
ext: a(0)=1 prepended and terms a(32) and beyond from _Andrew Howroyd_, Oct 02 2019
